meanings.sent1: She glunched at the rainy weather outside.
meanings.sent2: The child glunched when told it was bedtime.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts to hide it, his glunched expression gave away his disappointment.
meanings.sent4: Her face glunched like a storm cloud ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's glunched look silenced the noisy classroom instantly.

meanings.definition: having a sour or displeased expression
meanings.sent1: The glunched man refused to join the festivities.
meanings.sent2: Her glunched face made everyone wonder what had upset her.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a glunched look when presented with the new brand of food.
meanings.sent4: The glunched expression on his face made him unapproachable.
meanings.sent5: The glunched expression on her face could sour milk.

meanings.definition: in a sullen or moody manner
meanings.sent1: She walked glunched into the room, clearly upset.
meanings.sent2: He sat glunched in the corner, avoiding eye contact.
meanings.sent3: The dog followed her glunched, as if sharing her bad mood.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved glunched across the sky, foretelling a storm.
meanings.sent5: The music played glunched in the background, setting a somber mood.
